properties.name: Contrast ADR - WAF Alert Correlation
properties.description: 'Correlates Contrast ADR security alerts with WAF logs to identify confirmed attack attempts that were either exploited or blocked. This rule helps security teams prioritize incidents by focusing on attacks that have been validated by application security monitoring.'

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: WAF Alert Confirmed {{result_s}}  by Contrast ADR on {{request_headers_referer_s}}  endpoint of {{application_name_s}}
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: WAF Alert Confirmed {{result_s}}  by Contrast ADR on {{request_headers_referer_s}}  endpoint of {{application_name_s}}
